DOC.brief_title: MOBile Instruction Low Back Pain ( MOBIL )
DOC.detailed_description: Patients arrive initial evaluation low back pain randomize either receive video education via application ( app ) tablet computer , usual care ( consist information form handout education prior see Primary Care Provider - PCP ) . To control exposure tablet computer , subject group use tablet computer fill self-reported outcome measure . This take place patient wait see PCP , blind educational intervention patient receive . After enrollment completion baseline outcome measure survey , subject randomize one 2 arm , receive intervention , proceed appointment PCP . The appointment PCP proceed per usual care standard , additional research intervention . The subject contact follow-up 1 6 month assessment self-reported outcome measure pain , function , disability . The investigator also abstract healthcare utilization claim data compare variable healthcare use group 6-month period follow enrollment ( radiograph , MRIs , prescription opioids , specialty referral ) .
DOC.criteria: 1 . A Tricare beneficiary primary complaint low back pain consulting primary care clinic 2 . Between age 18 50 year 3 . Read speak English well enough interact mobile education technology , provide informed consent follow study instruction 1 . History prior surgery lumbosacral spine 2 . Medical `` red flag '' potentially serious condition include cauda equina syndrome , major rapidly progress neurological deficit , fracture , cancer , infection , systemic disease 3 . Known current pregnancy history pregnancy last 6 month 4 . Already see primary care episode low back pain within last 3 month
